body:
Hi, im Kroomsam a currently player of avicus .
Im here to do a question to Mr executive, Emeral sword And other player that play competitive.
Mr executive say that he is thinking to organízate a tournament of CTW,DTM.That's a Good Idea And that maybe to be the server moré famous. But if u going to do that pl0x make ir quick. Thanks :D

title: Tournament? EmeraldSword?

replies.body:
As much as I love your optimism, this is unlikely. It will take a while to make a solid plugin and maps. I would rather this take a very long time and be high quality, then to have it be rushed and terrible quality. I have spoken to members of the committee and that is that they are planning to do. 

Quality, Lengthy Release >Terrible, Fast Release
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
There has been WAY too many threads about this, it's not that difficult to make an unofficial tourney, you just need a good server and someone with experience, and you can get some nebula's map by asking the map makers.
btw...the official tourney is "coming", but I don't know if it is close or far

replies.body:
http://old.avicus.net/forums/topic/10272 

"Hey everyone, its Max here. The tournament committee has been hard at work. DoctaPop, BenDooley, and I have been working on numerous rules and regulations for an upcoming tournament. None are being planned as of now, but we want to be ready for the upcoming future"     (In case you don't believe DoctaPop)

replies.body:
There are lots of unofficial teams, even before a tournament committee was ever established, not having a teams sub-forum would make organization difficult.

Also, while a tournament isn't exactly guaranteed, there's been a lot of planning going into it.

When the new website comes (hopefully soon), teams can be officially formed and their stats tracked.
